name: Down to the Roots
description:
Use Arrow Keys or WASD to control.

Up is jump.

Remember that this is a playable proof of concept. Not the full game. Not yet ;-)

Background story:

Our heroine grew up beyond the forest in a small but prosperous village.

She lives there with her parents and siblings in modest prosperity.

In a mystical world in harmony with nature.

One day her auntie was stung by a humblebumble and got sick. 

For the help to brew a potion for cure our heroine has to get a special ingredient which is called "The Root of the Roots".

This grows far underground deep in a labyrinth of earth, wood, roots, hurting obstacles and dangerous creatures.

Help our heroine to discover "The Root of the Roots" before the torch gets extinguished.
